price: 60. Kaadu usun maaluk yaceenim kee meqe taamoomik abaanam sorkocobaxitte keenik Yallak meesitak aba mara, aben meqe taamoomi Yallih xaqul keenik oggolsime waytaah kay digaalák ken naggoyse waytaamih bololuh, diggah usun Qhiyaamah ayro kaa fan cisaabah gacan waqdi.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَواْ وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yu'tūna mā ātaw waqulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rājiʿūna
